description: This file implements a Datadog connector plugin for a monitoring integration framework. It defines a class `DatadogConnector` that provides methods to get metadata, schema, OAuth URL, handle OAuth callback, test connection, and fetch sample data related to Datadog services.

classes.name: DatadogConnector
classes.description: A plugin class for integrating with Datadog monitoring services.

methods.name: PluginMetadata get_metadata(self)
methods.description: Returns metadata information about the Datadog plugin.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_config_schema(self)
methods.description: Provides the JSON schema for configuring the Datadog plugin.

methods.name: str authorize_url(self, redirect_uri: str, state: str)
methods.description: Generates the OAuth authorization URL for Datadog.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] handle_oauth_callback(self, code: str, state: str)
methods.description: Processes OAuth callback to retrieve tokens.

methods.name: bool test_connection(self, config: Dict[str, Any], tokens: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Checks the connection to Datadog with provided credentials.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] fetch_sample(self, config: Dict[str, Any], tokens: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Fetches sample data from Datadog for testing.

ctags.name: authorize_url
ctags.pattern: /^    def authorize_url(self, redirect_uri: str, state: str) -> str:$/

ctags.name: fetch_sample
ctags.pattern: /^    async def fetch_sample(self, config: Dict[str, Any], tokens: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None/
ctags.signature: (self, config: Dict[str, Any], tokens: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)

ctags.name: handle_oauth_callback
ctags.pattern: /^    async def handle_oauth_callback(self, code: str, state: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: test_connection
ctags.pattern: /^    async def test_connection(self, config: Dict[str, Any], tokens: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = N/
ctags.signature: (self, config: Dict[str, Any], tokens: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
